description: "A map to aid in the navigation of the rivers leading to Saigon (Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam). Details include bathymetry (water depth), currents, and a side view (or ‘elevation’) of hills to use as a landmark. Tides are described in written remarks."
title: "Map   of   the   River   of   Don-nai   from   Cape   St.   James   to   the   city   of   Saigon   ...   by   M.   Dayot   ...   1791   with   additions   to   1820   by   John   White"
